SEARCH
Package Geometry

Class Polygon

java.lang.Object
Geometry.Polygon
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGeometricShape<Polygon>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Rectangle, Triangle
public class Polygon extends Object implements IGeometricShape<Polygon>
Represents an immutable simple polygon
